documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Such portents assure the shooter that his bloody work will not be in vain.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The pure of heart shall want not for courage, even in the face of death.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: What was… is… and what will be. All of these things are as clear as a Spring morning.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Somehow, by some preternatural ability perhaps, this one tends to know what will be.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: They'll know, they'll know that it is I that encompasses their doom!

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Rituals must be performed perfectly, down to the finest detail, if the desired results are to be obtained.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: If you stay here, the only way out will be death.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: You really don't want to go down that road, trust me. Nothing good will come of it.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: It is not this person who speaks, but the very gods themselves, using them as a vessel.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Contrition over moments of moral weakness is important, for having learned, one may be delivered from ruin as a consequence.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Truly one of the tenets of moral excellence in man; when one is honest, all may know where they stand.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Not an agent of people, but of the very gods themselves.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Misery loves company.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The gods can be tempted into serving one, if you know how to approach them...

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The prescribed methods of ritual must be closely adhered to if one is to fruitfully commune with the divine.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Such things sow discord in the haunts of men... which was exactly their intention from the very beginning...

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: No good can come of this endeavour, only pain and suffering.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Who would believe that vast hosts of warriors would listen intently when this one speaks? Yet it is true.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Athena Pallas, protector of kingdoms, accept this offering and our prayers for your divine favour.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Unused 2

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Bearing shield and spear, Athena Promachus shall lead the anointed to glory.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: In times of peace, prepare for war, which surely comes again like the changing of the season.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Unused 2

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The war-god demands the blood of his foes, so blood He shall most certainly have!

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The Lord of the Storms assures our armies of strength and our fleets of greater reach.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Unused 1

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: This one will not be blown off-course and dashed against the rocks, for the storm-lord favours them and guides their hand.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Worship of the Healer assures this one of peace and normality at home.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Those who follow the averter of evil know that he will stand for them against the other gods.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: To those who serve Him faithfully, Apollo offers wards against ill-health, epidemics, and evil.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: For unions of all kinds are blessed and protected by the goddess' divine hand.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Unused 2

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Mighty Zeus' queen, though fickle, vengeful and easily enraged, may also shield Her charges and their companions, even from certain death.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: I am love personified, in no small part to Her blessings.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Unused 2

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Aphrodite smiles benevolently upon Her loyal servant, helping them along the way when needed.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: I am not the priestess you are looking for.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Unused 2

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: This one spends their days in solemn study of the divine. In return, Olympus smiles benevolently and aids their rituals.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Mighty Zeus smiles upon His faithful children, gifting His protection to those who live and die in His name.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Unused 2

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The father of all the gods smiles upon His faithful servant, protects them and those with them from harm.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: May their arrows, javelins and slingshot strike true.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Artemis has spoken: one shot, one kill.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Much can be learned from the entrails of the sacrifice, if you know how to interpret them.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: This one's word is their bond. Let none doubt the truth of their stance.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Regret is the first step on the road to redemption in the gods' eyes.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Those selected by the gods to face their wrath shall know only dejection and regret, assuming they live...

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Let us see what will be… I see a return, in strength, and for glory unending.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: I advise caution – your enemies are powerful and will not show you mercy.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Two things, my lord, must ye know of the wise woman. First, she is a woman... and second, she is...

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: All I can think of is that the gods favour them and keep them from harm.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The gods are looking out for this one; it's the only explanation.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Flawless performance of ritual ensures that not only are the gods contacted, but their favour is secured also.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: There's a certain divine purity in keeping things simple.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: You can get quite far in life with an elegant turn of phrase.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: With Hermes' tailwind they travel lightly and far.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The gods forgive the mistakes of those who serve them. They also grant second chances.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Fear not, brave warriors, for the gods see you this day; it is they who vie to keep or take your lives.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Passive, but not passionless. Quite the opposite in fact.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: This warning speaks of the strength to stand fast against the tide of death. You have such strength within you.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Remember your training and the gods will see you through. I have seen it.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: This uncanny soul knows which way the winds of war blow, and therefore just when to strike.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: If Asclepius has a say in it, this one will not suffer.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The god of healing knew the way. Those who study his insights can hope to heal mortal men.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: For men will not just be healed, they will be cured in their entirety, for all time, and be all the better for it.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Disciples are attracted by this one's sanctity and so assist them in their work.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Unused 2

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Clearly blessed and favoured by the divine Olympians, this one's ability is clear to their people, who look to them for succour.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Perhaps you should go home to your family? Without you, they hunger.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: There's no such thing as bad luck, only dark designs now come to fruition.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: More than mere procedure, this one's sacred duties connect them to the gods, and must be seen through to the end.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: We're not ready to see you yet, if ever.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Having succeeded, and in no small part due to their eloquent tongue, this one now has a taste for victory, which drives them ever onwards.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: By the pricking of my thumbs, something wicked this way comes.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: We're not ready to see you yet, if ever.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The gods look after their own.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: More than merely favoured, it would seem all at Olympus keep this one from harm.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Such portents assure the shooter that his bloody work will not be in vain.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The pure of heart shall want not for courage, even in the face of death.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: What was… is… and what will be. All of these things are as clear as a Spring morning.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: To live by your wits, to fight, to kill your enemies, to see defeat in their eyes at the end. It is the stuff of dreams for the true warrior.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: They'll know, they'll know that it is I that encompasses their doom!

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Rituals must be performed perfectly, down to the finest detail, if the desired results are to be obtained.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: If you stay here, the only way out will be death.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: You really don't want to go down that road, trust me. Nothing good will come of it.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: It is not this person who speaks, but the very gods themselves, using them as a vessel.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Contrition over moments of moral weakness is important, for having learned, one may be delivered from ruin as a consequence.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Truly one of the tenets of moral excellence in man; when one is honest, all may know where they stand.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Not an agent of people, but of the very gods themselves.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Misery loves company.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The gods can be tempted into serving one, if you know how to approach them...

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Winning isn't everything, for their is victory in heroic death also, but it makes up for many of war's Hadean privations.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Such things sow discord in the haunts of men... which was exactly their intention from the very beginning...

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: No good can come of this endeavour, only pain and suffering.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Who would believe that vast hosts of warriors would listen intently when this one speaks? Yet it is true.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Athena Pallas, protector of kingdoms, accept this offering and our prayers for your divine favour.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Unused 2

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Bearing shield and spear, Athena Promachus shall lead the anointed to glory.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: In times of peace, prepare for war, which surely comes again like the changing of the season.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Unused 2

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The war-god demands the blood of his foes, so blood He shall most certainly have!

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The Lord of the Storms assures our armies of strength and our fleets of greater reach.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Unused 1

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: This one will not be blown off-course and dashed against the rocks, for the storm-lord favours them and guides their hand.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Worship of the Healer assures this one of peace and normality at home.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Those who follow the averter of evil know that he will stand for them against the other gods.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: To those who serve Him faithfully, Apollo offers wards against ill-health, epidemics, and evil.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: For unions of all kinds are blessed and protected by the goddess' divine hand.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Unused 2

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Mighty Zeus' queen, though fickle, vengeful and easily enraged, may also shield Her charges and their companions, even from certain death.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: I am love personified, in no small part to Her blessings.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The construction of military works is both an art and a science, and requires understanding of both.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Aphrodite smiles benevolently upon Her loyal servant, helping them along the way when needed.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: I am not the priestess you are looking for.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Unused 2

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: This one spends their days in solemn study of the divine. In return, Olympus smiles benevolently and aids their rituals.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Mighty Zeus smiles upon His faithful children, gifting His protection to those who live and die in His name.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Unused 2

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The father of all the gods smiles upon His faithful servant, protects them and those with them from harm.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: May their arrows, javelins and slingshot strike true.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Artemis has spoken: one shot, one kill.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Much can be learned from the entrails of the sacrifice, if you know how to interpret them.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: This one's word is their bond. Let none doubt the truth of their stance.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Regret is the first step on the road to redemption in the gods' eyes.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Those selected by the gods to face their wrath shall know only dejection and regret, assuming they live...

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Let us see what will be… I see a return, in strength, and for glory unending.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: I advise caution – your enemies are powerful and will not show you mercy.

documents.localised_description: Two things, my lord, must ye know of the wise woman. First, she is a woman... and second, she is...

documents.localised_description: All I can think of is that the gods favour them and keep them from harm.

documents.name: Priestess

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Spheres filled with water enable things that are far away to appear much closer, so they may be clearly observed.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: There's a certain divine purity in keeping things simple.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: You can get quite far in life with an elegant turn of phrase.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: With Hermes' tailwind they travel lightly and far.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: The heavens are the limit for those who do not fear death.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Fear not, brave warriors, for the gods see you this day; it is they who vie to keep or take your lives.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Passive, but not passionless. Quite the opposite in fact.

documents.name: Priestess
documents.localised_description: Reasoning is unnecessary when you know something in your very bones.

documents.name: Priestess

documents.localised_description: Remember your training and the gods will see you through. I have seen it.

documents.localised_description: There's no such thing as bad luck, only dark designs now come to fruition.

documents.name: Warlord - Warmonger
documents.localised_description: Strongly-built, yet still fast-moving, this heavy chariot has seen almost as much action as the warmonger it bears to combat.

documents.name: Warlord - Warmonger
documents.localised_description: Solid and powerful, this heavy chariot is the ideal place for the warmonger to stand and rain armour-piercing death down upon the foe.

documents.name: Warlord - Warmonger
documents.localised_description: Well-built yet swift, this chariot is a sturdy fighting platform from which the warmonger can bring death straight to their enemies' door.
